Filter Movies by Genre

filter_movies_by_genre.Rd

This function filters the summer_movies dataset by the specified genre. If "All" is selected, it returns the entire dataset without filtering.

Usage

filter_movies_by_genre(data, genre)

Arguments

data

A data frame containing movie data, such as summer_movies.

genre

A character string specifying the genre to filter by. Use "All" to include all genres.

Value

A data frame filtered by the specified genre.

Examples

data("summer_movies")
# Filter for Comedy movies
filter_movies_by_genre(summer_movies, "Comedy")
